rows.label: tev026401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev026401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Brenna about Vandham.

rows.label: tev026401_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev026401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Brenna if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev026401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Brenna about Skells.

rows.label: tev026401_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Brenna about recent developments.

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0001
rows.name:
One minute he's supervising Skell maintenance in the
test hangar and administrative district...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0002
rows.name:
Then an hour later, he's standing in a BLADE base
camp on the front lines discussing battle strategy.
I can't keep up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0003
rows.name:
The guy just turns up out of nowhere. Has he figured
out how to teleport or something?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0004
rows.name:
At least we've got a commander who's on the ball.
I mean, look how far he's gotten us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm not big on his freewheeling attitude, but the city
needs somebody like him now more than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0011
rows.name:
I work with this technician named Alan. Know him?
Anyway, I'll admit he's gifted, but he really needs to
get his head out of the clouds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0012
rows.name:
He thinks outside the box, which is pretty great,
but the projects he decides to push forward are just
too damn risky.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I don't think it's sunk in that he's not a trainee
anymore. Accidents here have real consequences that
can cost people their lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0014
rows.name: I wonder if he's ready to take responsibility for that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0020
rows.name:
If your Skell's arm is compromised, you won't be able
to use the weapon the Skell is holding. Obvious, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0021
rows.name:
There's no point in buying powerful weapons unless
your Skell is sturdy enough to hang on to them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG0022
rows.name:
So I suggest you pick up arm parts with adequate
armor whenever you upgrade your weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG1001
rows.name:
I have to hand it to Alanâ€”I never even would have
considered using Ganglion tech for a new weapon,
let alone actually pulled it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG1002
rows.name:
He's the only guy I know crazy enough to think
something like that up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG1003
rows.name:
I've been critical of him and called him irresponsible,
but he made the right call here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG1004
rows.name:
All this time, I've been so scared of making a mistake
and getting blamed for it that I've stopped myself from
doing anything significant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev026401_MSG1005
rows.name:
Well, this project has been a wake-up call.
I'll try to be more like Alan and Lin and take a
courageous approach to my work![ST:wait ]
